name: Stickman Baseball Home Run
description:
Stickman is back and he's swinging for the fences!

Swipe the screen to smash that ball as far as you can, but be sure not to strike out! Accumulate stars by hitting the ball in different directions and use your stars to unlock bonus levels!

From a 4-time featured App Gaming Studio and makers of the hit-games Stickman Trampoline, Stickman High Diving, and Stickman Big Air Skateboarding with over 5 million downloads - The App Ward brings you Stickman Baseball Home Run!
